title: Mountain Meditation
description: A guided imagery session to help you visualize serene landscapes.

title: Body Scan
description: Body scan meditations invite you to move your focus of attention around the body, being curious about your experience and observing any sensations that you become aware of.

title: Sitting Meditation
description: In sitting meditations, the breath frequently serves as the primary point of focus during the practice. Occasionally, they also integrate an awareness of sounds, bodily sensations, thoughts, or emotions.
